thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text: Tour director was knowledgeable about the region and local guides where excellent. During free time walking through a local village with our tour director, a lady sitting out side her home, called to our TD inviting the group to come in for some tea. A truly unique experience inside a locals home, such hospitality from people with very little but so happy to have us in their home. Naturally, with guidance from our TD, we made a small contribution to their household.
